content: Under the Enhanced Medical Benefits for COVID-19, the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit due to COVID-19 provides $100 for every 24 hours, is not available for the Basic plan, but has a total limit of $1,000 for the Silver plan, $2,000 for the Gold plan, and $3,000 for the Platinium plan.
questions: What is the daily cash benefit provided under the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit for COVID-19?
Is the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit for COVID-19 available under the Basic plan?
What is the maximum limit for the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit under the Silver plan?
How much can one receive under the Gold plan for the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit due to COVID-19?
What is the total limit of the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit for the Platinium plan?
How often is the $100 disbursed under the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit for COVID-19?
Are there different limits for the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit based on the plan type?
What are the differences in the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit between the Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans?
Can you receive the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit for more than 10 days under any plan?
What is the duration required to qualify for each $100 benefit under the Overseas Hospital Cash Benefit?
